name: ExpandingSnake
description:
Simple game of snake but the playable area expands as you progress. Initial movement is slow until the playable area has expanded to a certain degree.

Hitting the edge will not kill you, you will simply warp to the opposite edge. As with regular Snake, hitting yourself will kill you.

WASD to move.

Number in the top left indicates your score (size of snake).

Number in the bottom right indicates your best score.
